featured.text: The Swiss military purchasers considered the new model with a corkscrew for opening wine not “essential for survival,” so officers had to buy this new model by themselves.

definition.zh_def: 開瓶器，一種用於拔出瓶塞的工具，通常用於葡萄酒瓶。
definition.en_def: A tool used for removing corks from bottles, typically wine bottles.
definition.example: He used a corkscrew to open the bottle of wine.
